title: Battlefield: Bad Co.
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Battlefield: Bad Company follows a wayward band of ordinary soldiers who decide that sometimes the gratitude of a nation just isn’t enough. Featuring a dramatic storyline loaded with a unique attitude, the game delivers the series' trademark sandbox gameplay in a universe where almost everything is destructible. The ever-changing battlefield forces players, their team mates and enemies to react accordingly and use destruction tactically. The game also features the all new, objective based multiplayer game mode "Gold Rush", supporting 24 players online. Play as attackers and defenders and make full use of the tactical destruction as well as the unique vehicle experience that can only be experienced in Battlefield: Bad Company.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Bad World (HD)
childDownloads.description: Haggard and Sweetwater have a serious discussion about a well known song.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ Community Choice Pack
childDownloads.description: The community has spoken! Battle it out on Par For the Course and Acta Non Verba, two single player levels turned into playgrounds for fierce multiplayer Conquest warfare as chosen by the players. This FREE map pack also contains the two DICE choices Crossing Over and Ghost Town, bringing the total number of maps to four. See you on these new battlefields, soldiers!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ Conquest
childDownloads.description: An old friend returns! The Conquest game mode was hugely popular in previous Battlefield games and now sees its addition to DICE’s latest blockbuster. Download the Conquest Pack for Battlefield: Bad Company for free and battle it out on four modified maps from the core game. In Conquest mode, the aim is to reduce the opposing team’s tickets to zero. Killing an enemy soldier depletes one ticket per kill, whilst capturing control points on the map causes enemy tickets to count down. See you on the Battlefield soldier!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Demo
childDownloads.description: Battlefield: Bad Company follows a wayward band of ordinary soldiers who decide that sometimes the gratitude of a nation just isn't enough. Featuring a dramatic storyline loaded with a unique attitude, the game delivers the series' trademark sandbox gameplay in a universe where almost everything is destructible. The game also features the all new, objective based multiplayer game mode "Gold Rush".

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Frostbite video
childDownloads.description: Meet the developers behind DICE's bleeding edge Frostbite game engine as we invite you behind the scenes at DICE in this new video.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Haggard's video message
childDownloads.description: See what kind of buddies Preston “New Guy” Marlowe is making while in B Company with personal video messages from each of the four soldiers. This first video comes from Haggard, who has taken the opportunity to send a message home from the frontlines in... Europe?

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Squad Gamer Pics
childDownloads.description: Get personal with Haggard, Sweetwater, Preston and Sarge - the renegade soldiers in Bad Company. Download the squad gamer pics today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Squad Theme
childDownloads.description: Get personal with Haggard, Sweetwater, Preston and Sarge, the renegade soldiers in Bad Company. Download the squad’s theme today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company Trailer 2 (HD)
childDownloads.description: Built specifically for next-generation consoles, Battlefield: Bad Company follows a wayward band of ordinary soldiers behind enemy lines, ready to risk it all on a quest for personal gain. Featuring a dramatic storyline loaded with attitude, the deep, cinematic experience game delivers the series' trademark sandbox gameplay in a universe where almost everything is destructible.

childDownloads.title: Demo Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Strike it rich in gold with Battlefield: Bad Company’s new demo on June 5th or Pre-Order now and get right into the action!    Get acquainted with the members of B-Company with a section of the single-player campaign from the opening level, Green Acres.  Then, offering a second helping of destruction and gold, the demo also includes a look at the new multiplayer mode, “Gold Rush.”  Explore the air, sea, and land with vehicles like the tank, buggy, schooner, and helicopter and take the battle to a new height on our popular level, Oasis.  Powered by the new Frostbite engine, up to 24 players can join in on a map and destroy practically everything in sight.    Welcome back to the Battlefield.

childDownloads.title: Dev Diary 2 - Characters
childDownloads.description: Join Patrick Bach, the Singleplayer Producer, as he walks you through the process of creating interactive, funny, and exciting characters in Battlefield: Bad Company.  See more from the Battlefield team at www.battlefield.com/badcompany

childDownloads.title: Developer Diary – Destruction (HD)
childDownloads.description: The studio teams at DICE are hard at work making Battlefield: Bad Company and destruction is the name of the game here.  In this behind the scenes look, the folks at DICE give you many reasons why they spend so much time destroying the things they build.  See why the producers are so excited about the destruction Bad Company offers, as they use gameplay footage to showcase the different ways you can blow stuff up!

childDownloads.title: Find All Five – Recon Kit (HD)
childDownloads.description: This high-powered sniper rifle puts plenty of distance in between you and your enemies. Whether you are defending your reserves from an oncoming army, or picking apart the attackers one-by-one, the sniper rifle is always in style.

childDownloads.title: Find All Five – Support Kit (HD)
childDownloads.description: Keep your team kicking on the Battlefield with an additional support kit unlock by signing up for the Battlefield newsletter.

childDownloads.title: Free Conquest Mode Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Get a look at Conquest mode now available for FREE!  Check out the trailer, download conquest mode, and head to the Battlefield for a new challenge!

childDownloads.title: Harvest Day Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: You are invited to Harvest Day, where the hills are green with grenades and the peaceful town has stationary weapons around every corner.  The newest map in Battlefield: Bad Company’s online multiplayer, Online Producer, Jamie Keen, gives you an overview of the map and shows unique strategies worked out through spectacular gameplay moments!

childDownloads.title: Rainbow Sprinkles (HD)
childDownloads.description: Sarge tries to stack the troops up to breach an important objective.

childDownloads.title: Redford Video Blog (HD)
childDownloads.description: Sergeant Redford has seen plenty of action while in B Company, maybe even too much, and having squad members like Sweetwater and Haggard in his crew doesn’t put his tensions to rest. With only a couple weeks left in the Army, Redford is on his last string and will let nothing come in his way of a peaceful retirement…or will he?

childDownloads.title: Snake Eyes (HD)
childDownloads.description: The squad has a surprise encounter with an interesting barrel.

childDownloads.title: Sweetwater’s Blog (HD)
childDownloads.description: Private Sweetwater isn’t one to laugh in the face of danger.  In fact, he’d rather find a good cave to hide in, but in B-Company, he’s faced with dangerous situations every day!  See how he’s holding up as he talks to his loyal video blog subscribers.  See more at www.battlefield.com/badcompany!

childDownloads.title: Teaser Trailer (720p)
childDownloads.description: Get a flavor for the tone, the destruction and the action that awaits in Battlefield: Bad Company.

childDownloads.title: TV Spot (HD)
childDownloads.description: Watch the uncut trailer now.
